A4819 & A4822
Fall 2013











Something else just happened to privacy that you haven't heard about

***
January 11, 2013

  • Node.js compiled for ARM/Raspberry Pi

    The first official version of Node.js compiled for the ARM processor used by the Raspberry Pi, v0.8.17, was released on January 11, 2013.

This marked the collapse of physical and web computing

***

To put it another way, we can now treat this...

...the way we treat this.

Which is to say, the way we treat most of this...

...using no more than this.

***

Historically

Client
HTML, CSS, Javascript

Server
Apache, PHP, Python, Perl, C, C++, Java, ...

Now

  • Client: HTML, CSS, Javascript

  • Server: Javascript

  • Bre Pettis, founder of Makerbot, on Wired Cover, October, 2012
